laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver is heterogeneous in echotexture without focal lesions or biliary dilatation. Common bile duct measures 4 mm. Gallbladder contains a 3 mm stone, is nondistended, with no wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. Pancreatic head and body are unremarkable. No hydronephrosis or concerning lesions in kidneys. Spleen is not enlarged. No free fluid.
